SELECT og.`id`, v.`name` visiter_name,g.`name` goods_name,og.`create_time` ,og.`number`,og.`price`,og.`total` FROM order_goods og,visiter v, goods g WHERE og.`goods_id` = g.`id` AND og.`visiter_id` = v.`id`
and v.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{visiterName},'%')
and g.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
